data.name: FTP Input
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="{{protocol}}://{{username}}@{{hostname}}:{{port}}/{{directoryname}}?password={{password}}&fileName={{filename}}&{{querystring query_params extra_query_params true}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
